node.name: Quiz
node.rich_text:
1. What file contains a list of directories that are not indexed by search engines? Ans.) robots.txt
2. The Whois lookup utility can be used to identify the nameservers of a particular domain. Ans.) True
3. Which one of the following DNS records is used to resolve a domain to a mail server?
MX TXT AAAA MS
Ans.) MX (Mail Exchange )
• MX (Mail Exchange) record: Specifies mail servers for receiving email. • TXT (Text) record: Stores arbitrary text information, often used for domain verification and other purposes. • AAAA (IPv6 Address) record: Maps a domain to an IPv6 address.
4. Sublist3r can be used to perform a subdomain brute force. Ans.) True
5. Which one of the following Google search queries can be used to search for subdomains for the domain INE.com? Ans.) site:*.ine.com
6. theHarvester can also be used to perform subdomain enumeration. Ans.) True
7. Which one of the following DNS records is used to specify domain aliases? Ans.) CNAME
8. Which one of the following Nmap scans can be used to perform a sneaky scan? Ans.) nmap -sV -T1 192.168.1.200
